articles.title: Esports debuts at Asian Games: PUBG to Dota 2, list of the seven medal sports - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Asian Games in Hangzhou include seven esports games. Indian teams participate in League of Legends, FIFA Online 4, Dota 2, and Street Fighter V.
